Segment.name: RES
Segment.comment: To provide the type, source, and amount of real estate sales price changes

Field.name: RealEstateSalesPriceChangeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of real estate sales price change

Field.name: SourceOfFundsCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the source of the funds

Field.name: TypeOfFundsCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of funds paid

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

SyntaxNote.name: C0603
SyntaxNote.comment: If RES06 is present, then RES03 is required.
